On a third failed save, the creature's speed is halved. On a fourth failed save, the creature dies and transforms into Korog. A successful saving throw lifts the curse, and the armor falls off. The creature is subject to the curse if it dons the armor again.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Korog is destroyed, his armor regrows his body in {@dice 1d10} days. If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts. Korog can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating his armor with a {@spell disintegrate} spell, transporting it to the Positive Energy Plane, or by throwing it into the heart of a volcano.

trait.name: Sacrilegious Aura
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of Korog uses a spell or ability that magically restores hit points, the creature must make a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, the creature's spell or ability fails and has no effect.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Korog makes three maul attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Designate Blood-Foe
entries: Korog declares one creature he can see within 30 feet as his blood-foe whom he swears to defeat. He can have up to three blood-foes designated at a time; any additional blood-foe removes another blood-foe of Korog's choice. Korog has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) ability checks against a blood-foe, and the blood-foe has disadvantage on melee and ranged weapon attack rolls against him.

action.name: Devastating Blast {@recharge}
entries: Korog unleashes a 30-foot cone of energy. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 52 ({@damage 15d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Korog's Command
entries: Korog commands his allies to move more swiftly. All allies who hear or see him are treated as if affected by a {@spell haste} spell until the end of their next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Korog adds 4 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, the Korog must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Lucky Shot
entries: Before Kressle makes a ranged attack, she can choose to have disadvantage on the attack roll, but if her attack hits it deals one extra die of the weapon's damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kressle makes two melee or ranged attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The krooth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Augment Critical
entries: If the krooth scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times instead of twice.

trait.name: Fearless
entries: The krooth has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The krooth has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The krooth makes one bite attack and one tail spike attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If a krooth hits a target creature with its bite attack, it can snap off one of its teeth in the wound. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}; the {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Kundal can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Kundal can use his action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into his true form, which is humanoid. His statistics, other than his AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. Kundal reverts to his true form if he dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: Kundal has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Kundal makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws or greataxe in hybrid form, or two with his greataxe in humanoid form.

action.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Leng envoy's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Leng Ruby
entries: Many denizens of Leng carry strange rubies mined from quarries in Leng. As long as a creature holds a Leng ruby that it willingly accepted as a gift or payment from a denizen of Leng, any denizen of Leng can target that creature with any divination spell it knows at a range of 1 mile, and the target has disadvantage on the saving throw. A typical Leng envoy carries {@dice 1d6} rubies when encountered.

trait.name: No Breath
entries: The Leng envoy doesn't need to breathe.

trait.name: Planar Regeneration
entries: A denizen of Leng maintains a connection to the demiplane of Leng at all times, and when away from Leng, they gain 15 hit points at the start of each round. They lose this ability on Leng or in areas where planar connections do not function. If killed, their body dissolves into nothingness in one minute, leaving their equipment behind. A slain denizen reforms in Leng; they can be permanently killed only when their planar regeneration doesn't function.

trait.name: Unusual Anatomy
entries: A denizen's internal anatomy varies from individual to individual and grants the Leng envoy resistance to all sneak attack and critical hit damage no matter the source.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Leng envoy makes three melee attacks or makes one melee attack and casts a spell.

action.name: Debilitating Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage and the target takes {@dice 1d6} Dexterity Ability damage. This damage can be healed normally but a target reduced to 0 Dexterity is {@condition paralyzed} until it regains 1 point.

action.name: Greater Striking Keen Kukri +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell the Leng envoy casts before the end of the Leng envoy's next turn. This weapon scores a critical hit on a 19 or 20. On a critical hit, the weapon inflicts an aberrant wound and the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns for 1 minute. The wound closes if the target receives magical healing.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (1 to 3 actions)
entries: The Leng envoy can cast one of its spells: an at-will spell costs 1 action, a 3/day spell costs 2 actions, and a 1/day spell costs 3 actions each.

legendary.name: Sudden Action
entries: The Leng envoy attacks with its debilitating bite or attacks with its kukri.

legendary.name: Play the Pipes (1/Day)
entries: So long as the Leng envoy is holding a musical instrument, it can play a melody to cast {@spell Otto's Irresistible Dance|PHB|irresistible dance}, unfathomable song to cast {@spell confusion}, or a trancelike dirge to cast {@spell feeblemind}. The spell targets all creatures in a 60-foot sphere centered on the Leng envoy instead of its usual targets. A creature that succeeds at its saving throw ({@dc 18}) against any spell is immune from all spells played from the envoy's pipes for 1 minute. Aberrations are immune to this music.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lerritan's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1e: {@spell plane shift} (only to the Elemental Planes of Earth and Fire, as well as the Material Plane)

trait.name: Magical Weapons
entries: The lerritan's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lerritan makes three attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Thrown Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 16} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Volcanic Eruption {@recharge 5}
entries: The volcano on the lerritan's back erupts and sends lava bombs raining down in a 30-foot radius. Creatures in this area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 14d12}) fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The lava globules quickly cool into heavy stones, transforming the area into {@quickref difficult terrain||3} creatures that aren't elementals. A creature that fails their saving throw by 5 or more against this effect are {@condition restrained} by the globules until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Jaws That Bite
entries: The lesser jabberwock's bite attack scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Planar Acclimation
entries: The lesser jabberwock treats the plane it is currently on as its native plane.

trait.name: Vorpal Fear
entries: If the lesser jabberwock takes damage from a {@item vorpal sword|DMG}, it becomes {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Whiffling
entries: The lesser jabberwock can use a bonus action when it flies or makes a wing attack during its turn, causing severe winds in a 30-foot radius around it. These winds move outward from the lesser jabberwock and last until the start of its next turn. All other creatures besides the lesser jabberwock within the area of effect move as if in {@quickref difficult terrain||3} and must succeed at a {@dc 22} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check to move toward the lesser jabberwock.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lesser jabberwock uses Manxome Foe, then makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Burble {@recharge 5}
entries: The lesser jabberwock creates a blast of strange noises and shouted nonsense in the various languages it knows (and invariably some languages it doesn't know), creating one of the following effects.

items.name: Burble (Maddening)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the lesser jabberwock must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be subjected to the effects of {@spell confusion} for 1 minute.

items.name: Burble (Thundering)
entries: Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 56 ({@damage 16d6}) thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. A creature that succeeds takes half as much damage and does not become {@condition deafened}.

action.name: Eyes of Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Manxome Foe
entries: The very presence of a lesser jabberwock is terrifying to its enemies. Each creature of the lesser jabberwock's choice that is within 120 feet of the lesser jabberwock and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the lesser jabberwock's Manxome Foe for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Claws That Catch
entries: If a creature within 10 feet of the lesser jabberwock takes the {@action Use An Object} action, moves from its square, or makes a ranged attack, the lesser jabberwock can make a claw attack against the creature as a reaction. If the attack hits, the target is {@condition incapacitated} and unable to move until the start of its next turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The lesser jabberwock makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Eyes of Flame (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The lesser jabberwock makes an Eyes of Flame attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lesser jabberwock beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the lesser jabberwock must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The lesser jabberwock can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Language Adaptation
entries: A leucrotta can learn any language it hears spoken for at least 10 minutes, adding it to its languages known and replacing the language it previously learned using this ability. In the Stolen Lands, a leucrotta typically knows Jotun as the language granted by this ability.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The leucrotta can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leucrotta makes three melee attacks: one with its bite and two with its hooves.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lure
entries: While hidden from view, the leucrotta uses its voice to charm up to twelve creatures within 60 feet of itself that it can see. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be affected by {@spell mass suggestion}. On a success, a creature is immune to this leucrotta's lure for the next 24 hours. If the leucrotta uses the victim's name during the lure, the target has disadvantage on its saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The leukodaemon's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Daemonic Pestilence
entries: A creature likely contracts {@disease daemonic pestilence|PKB} from being attacked by or in close proximity to a leukodaemon. A creature that starts its turn within 50 feet of a leukodaemon must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease daemonic pestilence|PKB}. A creature with this disease establishes a telepathic link with the leukodaemon that conferred this disease. The range of this mental connection is unlimited, even spanning across planes. The creature must also make a Constitution saving throw each day after a long rest, gaining a level of {@condition exhaustion} instead of recovering one on a failure. {@disease Daemonic pestilence|PKB} persists until the target accrues 6 successes against the disease.

trait.name: Plaguebearer
entries: The leukodaemon is immune to disease, but can contract them for the purposes of spreading them.

trait.name: Plaguesense
entries: A leukodaemon senses any creature within 60 feet that has a disease. It knows the type and current stage of all diseases carried by such creatures.

trait.name: Infectious Aura
entries: The leukodaemon radiates a 30 feet radius aura of infection. All creatures that start their turn inside of this aura have disadvantage on saving throws against contracting or resisting diseases.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leukodaemon makes one claw attack and one bite attack, or three {@item +1 longbow|DMG} attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease daemonic pestilence|PKB}.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease daemonic pestilence|PKB}.

action.name: Longbow +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease daemonic pestilence|PKB}.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The leukodaemon exhales a cloud of corpse-bloated, biting black flies in a 20-foot cone. A creature within the cone must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) piercing damage and becoming {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failed save. On a success, the creature takes half the damage and is not {@condition poisoned}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Lickweed is an 8th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following Druid spells prepared:
footerEntries: *Lickweed casts this spell on himself before combat if able.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Lickweed can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} actions as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lickweed makes two attacks.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Lintwerth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When Lintwerth dies, he explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 feet of him must then succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A {@condition blinded} creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Lintwerth regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point and is in dust or sand.

trait.name: Sleepless
entries: Lintwerth can't be put to sleep by magic.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lintwerth makes three claw attacks or casts a spell and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Dusty Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blinding Breath
entries: Lintwerth exhales a 15-foot cone of blinding dust. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Cloud of Dust {@recharge 5}
entries: Lintwerth breathes a cloud of dust in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The air in this area remains thick with dust for the next 1 minute. Creatures that breathe who start their turn in the area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the start of their next turn as they are wracked by violent coughing and sneezing.

action.name: Elemental Form (2/Day)
entries: Lintwerth magically polymorphs into {@filter an elemental with a challenge rating of 6 or less|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&6]|type=elemental|miscellaneous=!adventure npc} and can remain in this form for up to 9 hours. He can choose whether his equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. He reverts to his true form if he dies or falls {@condition unconscious}. He can revert to his true form using a bonus action on his turn.

While in a new form, he retains his game statistics and ability to speak, but his AC, movement modes, Strength, and Dexterity are replaced by those of the new form, and he gains any special senses, proficiencies, traits, actions, and reactions (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that he lacks. Lintwerth can cast spells with verbal or somatic components in his new form. The new form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Linzi is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). She has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: {@item Leather armor|PHB}, {@item rapier|PHB}, {@item shortbow|PHB}, {@item arrows (20)|PHB}, {@item explorer's pack|PHB}, {@item lute|PHB}.

trait.name: Bardic Inspiration (3/Day)
entries: Linzi uses her bonus action on her turn to choose one creature other than herself within 60 feet of you who can hear her. That creature gains one Bardic Inspiration die, a {@dice d6}. Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. The creature can wait until after it rolls the {@dice d20} before deciding to use the Bardic Inspiration die, but must decide before the GM says whether the roll succeeds or fails. Once the Bardic Inspiration die is rolled, it is lost. A creature can have only one Bardic Inspiration die at a time.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Linzi has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Linzi can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than hers.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When Linzi rolls 1 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: Linzi can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Linzi is a 7th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). She has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: {@item +1 leather armor|DMG|Leather armor +1}, {@item +1 Rapier|DMG|rapier +1}, {@item +1 Shortbow|DMG|shortbow +1}, {@item arrows (20)|PHB}, {@item potion of healing|DMG|potions of healing} (3), {@item explorer's pack|PHB}, {@item lute|PHB}.

trait.name: Bardic Inspiration (3/Day)
entries: Linzi uses her bonus action on her turn to choose one creature other than herself within 60 feet of you who can hear you. That creature gains one Bardic Inspiration die, a {@dice d6}. Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. The creature can wait until after it rolls the {@dice d20} before deciding to use the Bardic Inspiration die, but must decide before the GM says whether the roll succeeds or fails. Once the Bardic Inspiration die is rolled, it is lost. A creature can have only one Bardic Inspiration die at a time. Linzi regains all of her expended uses of Bardic Inspiration when she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Linzi has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Linzi can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than hers.

trait.name: Jack of All Trades
entries: Linzi can add half her proficiency bonus (+3), rounded down, to any ability check she makes that doesn't already include her proficiency bonus.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When Linzi rolls 1 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: Linzi can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Song of Rest
entries: If Linzi or any friendly creatures who can hear her performance regain hit points at the end of a short rest by spending one or more Hit Dice, each of those creatures regains an extra {@dice 1d6} hit points.

action.name: Rapier +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow +1
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Countercharm
entries: As an action, Linzi can start a performance that lasts until the end of her next turn. During that time, she and any friendly creatures within 30 feet of her have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed}. A creature must be able to hear her to gain this benefit. The performance ends early if she is {@condition incapacitated} or silenced—or if she voluntarily ends it (no action required).

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the lizardfolk deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the lizardfolk that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the lizardfolk doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Terrain Adept
entries: The scout has advantage on attacks and contested ability checks against non-lizardfolk in {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, or against targets in water that lack a swim speed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizardfolk makes one jaw attack and one tail attack.

action.name: Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blowgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage and 6 ({@damage 1d12}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target becomes disorientated and clumsy, and attacks on the target have advantage while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The lizardfolk warrior can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Terrain Adept
entries: The warrior has advantage on attacks and contested ability checks against non-lizardfolk in {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, or against targets in water that lack a swim speed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizardfolk warrior makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longspear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sudden Charge
entries: The lizardfolk warrior dashes up to 60 feet toward an enemy, then makes a single melee attack.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The logger has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The logger makes two handaxe attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lurker's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Blend with Light
entries: When the lurker is in an area of bright light, it can turn {@condition invisible} as a bonus action. Any equipment the lurker wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

trait.name: Ritual Gate (1/Day)
entries: If the lurker has reduced a creature to 0 hit points since the beginning of its previous turn, it can use {@spell conjure woodland beings} as a bonus action. In addition, if the creature(s) it summons have the same alignment as the lurker, it does not need to {@status concentration|PHB|concentrate} to maintain the spell. If it casts {@spell conjure woodland beings} again, the creatures summoned with the ritual gate disappear.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The lurker deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the lurker that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the lurker doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lurker makes two attacks with its claws or its motes of light in any combination.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Mote of Light
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 10/30 ft., one creature. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) force damage and 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) radiant damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in golden radiance for 1 minute (as {@spell faerie fire}). If a creature fails another saving throw against this effect while already outlined, the duration is reset to 1 minute and the creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 round.

action.name: Daylight Door (Recharges after a Short Rest)
entries: The lurker magically teleports itself from an area of bright light, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to a location up to 120 feet away to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in bright light.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Malgorzata is a 7th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Malgorzata has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, Malgorzata can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Malgorzata expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The swarm regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the swarm takes fire or thunder damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the swarm's next turn. The swarm dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny plant. The swarm can't regain hit points other than by its own regeneration, nor can it gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Vulnerable to Supernatural Darkness
entries: In areas of magical darkness (such as those created by the {@spell darkness} spell), the swarm is slowed, as the {@spell slow} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes three attacks: one with its bites and two with its vine whips.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Vine Whips
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Shriek (Recharge after Long Rest)
entries: The swarm can give voice to an unsettling shriek. All creatures within a 30-foot of the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom save or become {@condition stunned} for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The marsh giant's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The marsh giant can breathe both air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marsh giant makes three attacks: it attacks once with its gaff and twice with its slam or makes two thrown rock attacks. It can make a hook shake action in place of its gaff attack.

action.name: +1 Gaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning or piercing damage, and the creature is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the marsh giant can't use its gaff on another target.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d4 + 6}) bludgeoning or piercing damage.

action.name: Thrown Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@dice 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning.

action.name: Hook Shake
entries: The marsh giant shakes a creature it has {@condition grappled} by its gaff, shaking it violently. The creature must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) piercing damage on a failure and, if the target is underwater, it begins suffocating if it wasn't already, as its breath is forced from its lungs.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mastiff of Tindalos's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mastiff of Tindalos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The mastiff of Tindalos's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Otherworldly Mind
entries: Whenever a creature targets the mastiff with a mental effect or attack (psychic damage, mind reading, charm, enchantments or similar attacks) that creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage on a failed {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, or half damage on success. If the creature fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it also becomes confused for 1 minute as the {@spell confusion} spell.

trait.name: Ripping Gaze
entries: The mastiff of Tindalos's eyes glow balefully, causing painful but bloodless wounds to tear open upon the body of a creature that meets its awful gaze. When a creature that can see the mastiff's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the mastiff, the mastiff can force the creature to make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw if the mastiff isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. The creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) slashing damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that succeeds on its saving throw by 5 or more is immune to this mastiff's gaze for 24 hours.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the mastiff until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the mastiff in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. The mastiff is immune to its own the gaze and the gaze of other hounds of Tindalos.

trait.name: Vulnerable to Curved Space
entries: When a mastiff of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90 or smaller, its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it gains the {@condition poisoned} condition. It can't recover from this condition, but the condition ends once the mastiff is again adjacent to a suitable angle.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mastiff can use angled entry and then makes three attacks: one with its jaws and two with its claws.

action.name: Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Angled Entry
entries: The mastiff of Tindalos teleports up to 120 feet to an angle of 90 (or more acute) it can see.
Once per day, the mastiff can use this ability to plane shift to or from the Dimension of Time, with the same restrictions on what angles it can appear next to.

action.name: Dimensional Anchor (1/Day)
entries: The mastiff of Tindalos targets a creature it can see within 120 feet of it The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be tied firmly to the plane it is currently in. Teleportation of any sort is impossible for the creature for 10 minutes. This effect is ended by {@spell dispel magic} or similar magic. Dimensional anchor does not prevent summoned creatures from disappearing after the duration of the spell that summoned them.

trait.name: Scent
entries: The mastodon can use its scent to detect creatures within 60 feet, but not pinpoint their location.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the mastodon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits with a gore attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the mastodon can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mastodon makes two stomp attacks. One stomp attack can be replaced by a trunk attack.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 5d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@dice 4d8 + 8}) bludgeoning.

action.name: Trunk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the mastodon can't use its trunk on another target.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Melianse's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring on material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Melianse is an 5th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Melianse knows the following sorcerer spells:
footerEntries: *These spells deal cold damage instead of fire damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Melianse can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Melianse has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Minognos-Ushad fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Minognos-Ushad makes one bite attack, two claw attacks, and one stinger attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 1d12 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) slashing damage plus. Instead of dealing damage, Minognos-Ushad can {@action grapple} the target (escape {@dc 19}).

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and the target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much poison damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Reflexive Sting
entries: When a creature fails to escape Minognos-Ushad's {@action grapple}, Minognos-Ushad makes a stinger attack against the creature.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Minognos-Ushad makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Stinger Attack
entries: Minognos-Ushad makes a stinger attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Minognos-Ushad beats his wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Minognos-Ushad can then fly up to half his flying speed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mitflit's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}). The mite can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Hatred
entries: Mitflits double their proficiency bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the dwarf or gnome subtype due to special training against these hated foes.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The mitflit has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Self-Loathing
entries: A mitflit's self-loathing makes them easy to influence. They have disadvantage on saving throws and ability checks to resist any Charisma-based skills or being {@condition charmed}.

trait.name: Vermin Keeper
entries: Through sounds and gestures, the mitflit can communicate simple ideas with arthropods. The knowledge and awareness of arthropods is limited by their intelligence, but at minimum, they can give information about nearby locations and monsters, including whatever they can perceive or have perceived within the past day. The mitflit can ask for small favors from arthropods, and has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks when communicating with them.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Vengeful
entries: When the mitflit is hit by an attack or fails a saving throw, the mitflit makes an attack against the creature that harmed it.

trait.name: Mohrg Spawner
entries: A Medium living creature slain by a mohrg rises {@dice 1d4} rounds later as a {@creature mohrg spawn|PKB} under the control of the mohrg that created it. A mohrg can't have more than 12 {@creature mohrg spawn|PKB} under its control at a time.

trait.name: Murderous Grip
entries: A creature {@condition grappled} by a mohrg has disadvantage on death saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mohrg makes one tongue attack and one claw attack.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed}. The creature can make a saving throw each around at the end of each of its turns, ending the paralysis on a success. The DC decreases by 1 each round the creature remains {@condition paralyzed}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 5d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength or Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} by the mohrg.

reaction.name: Killing Blow
entries: When a creature within 10 feet of a mohrg is reduced to 0 hit points, it can make a tongue attack against that creature. It has advantage on this attack roll.

monster.name: Mohrg Spawn
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Mohrg Minion
entries: If the {@creature mohrg|PKB} that created a mohrg spawn is destroyed, the mohrg spawn is destroyed as well, collapsing into a pile of decayed flesh and bones.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mohrg spawn makes one tongue attack and one claw attack.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed}. The creature can make a new saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the paralysis on a success. The DC decreases by 1 each round the creature remains {@condition paralyzed}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength or Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} by the mohrg.

trait.name: Ferocious Charge
entries: If the monster hunter moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Rage
entries: The monster hunter can enter rage as a bonus action. While in rage, the hunter has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, they deal an additional 2 damage with each attack, and they gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the hunter falls {@condition unconscious}, or if their turn ends and they haven't either attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since its last turn.

trait.name: Relentless Rage
entries: The monster hunter's rage can keep them fighting despite grievous wounds. If the hunter drops to 0 hit points while they are raging and doesn't die outright, they can make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw. If they succeed, they drop to 1 hit point instead. Each time the monster hunter uses this feature after the first, the DC increases by 5. When they finish a short or long rest, the DC resets to 10.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monster hunter makes two attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The morrigna's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The morrigna is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). The morrigna has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Lifesense
entries: The morrigna can sense and pinpoint living creatures within 60 feet as if it had {@sense blindsight}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The morrigna has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The morrigna regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If the morrigna takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the morrigna's next turn. The morrigna dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The morrigna can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The morrigna makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Staff +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, or 14 ({@dice 1d8 + 10}) if used with two hands, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage or radiant damage against undead.

action.name: Web Wrappings
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage, or radiant damage against undead. On a successful hit, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}. The morrigna can attack and {@action grapple} up to two separate targets with web wrappings at a time.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The morrigna magically polymorphs into {@filter a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or lesser than its own|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&15]|type=beast;humanoid|miscellaneous=!adventure npc}, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the morrigna's choice).

In a new form, the morrigna retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

action.name: Summon Minions
entries: The morrigna summons one {@creature giant spider} or one {@creature Swarm of Spiders|MM|swarm of insects (spiders)}. The summoned creature appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the morrigna and acts as an ally of the morrigna. It remains for 10 minutes, until the morrigna dies, or until the morrigna dismisses it as an action.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The morrigna adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the morrigna must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Wrappings Lash
entries: When the morrigna is attacked by a creature within 10 feet, it makes a web wrappings attack against the attacking creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mu spore makes one bite attack or swallow attack, and up to two constrict attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 6d6 + 8}) piercing damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Huge or smaller creature. {@h}41 ({@damage 6d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}) and {@condition restrained} until this {@action grapple} ends.

action.name: Spore Cough {@recharge 4}
entries: A mu spore can release a cloud of burrowing spores in a 120-foot cone. The burrowing spores deal 110 ({@damage 20d10}) necrotic damage to all creatures and wooden structures in the area, or half damage to any creatures that succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. Plants and plant creatures are immune to this damage.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The mu spore makes one bite attack against a Huge or smaller target it is {@action grapple|PHB|grappling}. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the {@action grapple} ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mu spore, and it takes 90 ({@damage 20d8}) acid damage at the start of each of the mu spore's turns. A mu spore can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the mu spore takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the mu spore must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the mu spore. If the mu spore dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the mu spore hits it with a melee attack, sticky tendrils reach to grab the attacker. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 20}).

trait.name: Mud Puddle
entries: While the mudwretch remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a puddle of mud.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mudwretch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Vulnerability to Desiccation
entries: A mudwretch has disadvantage on saving throws against spells that deal fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mudwretch makes two slam attacks or one spew mud attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spew Mud
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be slowed for 1 minute, as per the {@spell slow} spell. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Enraged Cunning
entries: A murder of crows can hound its prey through most barriers. Simple latches, unsecured chimney flues, loosely shuttered windows, and similar obstacles rarely keep a murder of crows away. A murder of crows automatically bypasses many of these simple obstructions and can attempt a {@dc 15} Dexterity ability check to get through more complex obstructions (such as closed windows or simple barricades).

trait.name: Distracting Horde
entries: Creatures that share the swarm's space or are within 5 feet of it have disadvantage on attack rolls and Constitution saving throws to maintain {@status concentration}. The area of the swarm is considered {@quickref difficult terrain||3}.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The Swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny beast. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm can attack every creature in its space with swarming beaks.

action.name: Swarming Beaks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or lower, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition blinded} until the end of the swarm's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The nabasu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Death-Stealing Gaze
entries: The nabasu exudes an aura of death in a 30-foot radius. Creatures that end their turns in this aura must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, they gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}, and the nabasu gains 10 temporary hit points. A creature that dies while subject to the effects of this {@condition exhaustion} level rises as a {@creature ghoul|MM} at the next midnight.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nabasu has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nabasu makes two melee attacks: one with its bite, and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The nabasu magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 100 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
entries: The nabasu chooses a demon to summon and attempts a magical summoning. The nabasu has a 50 percent chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} {@creature shadow|MM|shadows}, or 1 {@creature barlgura|MM}. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ngara is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks), and she needs only verbal components to cast its spells. She has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 30 ({@damage 7d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nilak is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her casting stat is Wisdom (save {@dc 16}). She has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Rapid Change Shape (2/Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Nilak magically polymorphs into {@filter a humanoid or beast that has a CR of 5 or less|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&5]|type=beast;humanoid|miscellaneous=!adventure npc}, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Nilak's choice). While transformed, all of Nilak's attacks are magical.

In a new form, Nilak retains her game statistics, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that she lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, she can use its bite in that form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nilak makes two attacks.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Niodrhast's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). Niodrhast can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Niodrhast makes four lashing tongues attacks.

action.name: Lashing Tongues
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 2d12 + 10}) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by Niodrhast. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the swallowing creature, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of Niodrhast's turns. If Niodrhast takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside them, Niodrhast must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of them. If Niodrhast dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by them and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge}
entries: Niodrhast exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures who fail this saving throw must repeat this saving throw at the start of their next turn or take an additional 27 ({@damage 5d10}) acid damage. The line of acid remains until the start of Niodrhast's next turn. If a creature moves into the affected area, or ends its turn there, it takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) acid damage.

reaction.name: Dimensional Wormhole
entries: When a creature teleports to a location within Niodrhast's awareness, Niodrhast creates an extradimensional wormhole at the triggering creature's current location. The wormhole remains for up to 1 minute and has no effect on creatures other than

reaction.name: Niodrhast
entries: If Niodrhast uses 5 feet of their movement, they can teleport to the wormhole's location, ending the effect.

reaction.name: Instant Suggestion
entries: When a creature fails a saving throw against one of Niodrhast's spells or abilities, Niodrhast can cast {@spell suggestion} on that creature if they have that spell available.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Niodrhast makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Niodrhast moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Tongue
entries: Niodrhast makes a lashing tongues attack.

legendary.name: Voluminous Acid (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Niodrhast focuses its internal acid production, allowing it to roll immediately to recharge its breath weapon.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Nishkiv deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Nishkiv that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Nishkiv doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nishkiv makes two dagger attacks. If his first attack hits, he has advantage on the second attack.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: A {@item crowbar|PHB}, {@item common clothes|PHB}, 15 gp, {@item shortsword|PHB}, {@item shortbow|PHB} and {@item quiver|PHB} with {@item Arrows (20)|PHB|20 arrows}, {@item burglar's pack|PHB}, {@item leather armor|PHB}, two {@item dagger|PHB|daggers}, {@item thieves' tools|PHB}.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Nok-Nok can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, Nok-Nok can deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to one creature he hits with an attack if he has advantage on the attack roll; or another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn't {@condition incapacitated}, and Nok-Nok doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: {@item Bag of holding}, a {@item crowbar|PHB}, {@item common clothes|PHB}, {@item shortsword|PHB}, {@item shortbow|PHB} and {@item quiver|PHB} with {@item Arrows (20)|PHB|20 arrows}, {@item burglar's pack|PHB}, {@item leather armor|PHB}, two {@item dagger|PHB|daggers}, {@item thieves' tools|PHB}, 640 gp.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Nok-Nok can take a bonus action on each of his turns to take a {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Fast Hands
entries: Nok-Nok can use the bonus action granted by his Cunning Action to make a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check, use {@item thieves' tools|PHB} to disarm a trap or open a lock, or take the {@action Use an Object} action.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Nok-Nok can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, Nok-Nok can deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage to one creature he hits with an attack if he has advantage on the attack roll; or another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn't {@condition incapacitated}, and Nok-Nok doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker Nok-Nok sees hits him with an attack, he can use his reaction to halve the attack's damage against him.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Ntavi has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Great Weapon Fighting
entries: When Ntavi rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack she makes with a melee weapon that she is wielding with two hands, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ntavi makes three attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed at a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The nuckelavee's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). The nuckelavee can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The nuckelavee can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Toxic Disease
entries: If any of the nuckelavee's melee attacks hits a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the nuckelavee moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same target, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the nuckelavee can make one hooves attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nuckelavee makes four attacks: one with its longsword, one with its bite, and two with its hooves.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nugrah is a 7th-level spell caster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attack.) Nugrah knows the following druid spells:
footerEntries: {@note {@spell Conjure Animals|PHB} is the closest identifiable analog for "summon monster" which doesn't exist, but is PF2e's "Summon Animal" in the original statblock.}

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wildshape (1/Day)
entries: Nugrah magically polymorphs into a {@creature giant badger|MM}, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Nugrah's choice). In this new form, Nugrah retains his game statistics, but his AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and he gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that he lacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nyrissa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nyrissa is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). Nyrissa has prepared the following druid and sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Blinding Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see Nyrissa's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, Nyrissa can force it to make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw if she isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails, the creature is instantly {@condition blinded}. The blindness lasts until the creature is cured by the {@spell heal} spell or other magic.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the save at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Nyrissa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Nyrissa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
Nyrissa is immune to the effects of her own Blinding Gaze as well as that of other nymphs. Nyrissa can suppress or resume this ability as a bonus action.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Nyrissa is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

trait.name: Inspiration
entries: Nyrissa can inspire an intelligent, willing creature by scratching that creature with a thorn from her body. This reduces that creature's hit points by 1 permanently, but grants the creature several abilities: {@sense darkvision} to a range of 60 feet, the ability to see {@condition invisible} creatures, and a +2 bonus to an ability of Nyrissa's choice. A bard granted this inspiration gains advantage on {@skill Performance} checks. Only one creature at a time can benefit from this inspiration. For the bulk of the Kingmaker Adventure Path, {@creature Castruccio Irovetti|PKB|King Irovetti} has this inspiration, but once he is slain or defeated, who Nyrissa grants the bonus to instead (if anyone) is left to the GM to determine.

trait.name: Land's Stride
entries: Moving through nonmagical {@quickref difficult terrain||3} costs Nyrissa no extra movement. She can also pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard. In addition, Nyrissa has advantage on saving throws against plants that are magically created or manipulated to impede movement, such those created by the {@spell entangle} spell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Nyrissa fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magical Secrets
entries: Nyrissa can prepare spells from the sorcerer list as well as the druid spell list; these spells count as druid spells for her and are included in her spells prepared.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Nyrissa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Protection from Decapitation (1/Day)
entries: The first time Nyrissa is decapitated by any effect, the effect is negated. She takes no damage from the attack, and is not decapitated, but then loses her protection from decapitation for 24 hours.

trait.name: Shame
entries: Nyrissa has disadvantage on rolls made against a creature that wields Briar, or any character who rules a kingdom. A character who understands the nature of this shame can attempt to forgive Nyrissa (requiring an action by the forgiving creature) by speaking to her in a language she understands. Nyrissa must attempt a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. If it fails, Nyrissa has disadvantage on all rolls until the end of her next turn. If she rolls a natural 1 on this saving throw, she calls for a truce to speak with the PCs as detailed in the {@i Kingmaker Adventure Path}.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Nyrissa can use her action to polymorph into a form that resembles any Medium fey or humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form.

trait.name: Toxic Weapons
entries: Nyrissa's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nyrissa makes three melee attacks with her thorny lash.

action.name: Thorny Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Hurled Thorn
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 60/300 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Stunning Glance
entries: Nyrissa fixes her gaze on one creature she can see within 30 feet of herself. The target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw against this magic or become {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The {@condition stunned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Lash Out
entries: Nyrissa makes two melee attacks with her thorny lash.

legendary.name: Focus Beauty
entries: Nyrissa uses her Stunning Glance.

legendary.name: Swift Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Nyrissa casts a spell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ogre spider makes three attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} this way.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 12} Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

trait.name: Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Three Heads
entries: The chimera has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. Any ability that would sever a chimera's head (such as a critical hit with a vorpal weapon) severs one head at random. Losing a head doesn't kill the chimera (as long as it has at least one head left), but it does prevent it from making attacks with the lost head (reducing its overall number of attacks). If the chimera loses the dragon head, it loses the Dragon Breath ability.

trait.name: Triple Opportunity
entries: The chimera gains 2 extra reactions each round that it can use only to make {@action opportunity attack|PHB|attacks of opportunity}. It must use a different head for each reaction, and it can't use more than one on the same triggering action. If it loses one of its heads, it also loses the corresponding extra reaction.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes four attacks, one with each head and one with its claws.

action.name: Dragon Bite
