entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage based on the color of the dragon head: fire for red, poison for green, cold for white, lightning for blue, and acid for black.

action.name: Lion Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Goat Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dragon Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The chimera breathes a 60-foot cone or line from its dragon head. All creatures in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity save, taking 45 ({@damage 13d6}) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save. The color of the chimera's dragon head determines the shape of the Dragon Breath and the type of damage it deals: fire cone for red, poison cone for green, cold cone for white, lightning line for blue, and acid line for black.

items.name: Dragon Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) {{damageType}} damage.

items.name: Dragon Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The chimera breathes a 60-foot {{aoe}} from its dragon head. All creatures in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity save, taking 45 ({@damage 13d6}) {{damageType}} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save.

trait.name: Release Jewel
entries: As a bonus action, Pavetta can give her dog {@creature Jewel|PKB} a command, then release the little terror to harry anyone who threatens her.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: If Pavetta is affected by Vengeful Rage, she makes 3 attacks with her dagger.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Intimidating Scream {@recharge}
entries: Baroness Pavetta shrieks in rage, and all foes within 30 feet of her must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom save or become demoralized by her wail and gain disadvantage on all checks until the end of her next turn. The scream also automatically alerts any allies within 100 feet that can hear her to her need for assistance.

reaction.name: Vengeful Rage
entries: If her beloved dog {@creature Jewel|PKB} is either killed or knocked {@condition unconscious}, Pavetta flies into a murderous rage. She gains advantage on all attack rolls, deals an additional 11 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage with weapons, and can use her Multiattack action. This rage persists for 1 minute, after which she gains two levels of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Quills
entries: A peluda's back and tail are covered in sharp black quills. A creature that strikes a peluda with a melee weapon or an unarmed attack must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The peluda makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail slap.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Slap
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The peluda exhales fire in a 50-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Quill Barrage (3/Day)
entries: The peluda fires dozens of spear-like barbs in all directions. All creatures within 15 feet of the peluda must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Phomandala is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). Phomandala has the following sorcerer spells known:

trait.name: Land's Stride
entries: Moving through nonmagical {@quickref difficult terrain||3} costs Phomandala no extra movement. She can also pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard. In addition, Phomandala has advantage on saving throws against plants that are magically created or manipulated to impede movement, such those created by the {@spell entangle} spell.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see Phomandala's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the her, Phomandala can force it to make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw if she isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Phomandala until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Phomandala in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Phomandala makes five melee attacks: one with her snake hair, two with her cobra bites, and two with her claws.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Cobra Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The piscodaemon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The piscodaemon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The piscodaemon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The piscodaemon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: See Invisibility
entries: The piscodaemon has a constant {@spell see invisibility} effect as per the spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The piscodaemon makes two claw attacks and one tentacles attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: A Pitax warden is a 5th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). They have the following bard spells known:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Pitax warden makes three greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The pixie's innate spellcasting ability which is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). The pixie can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Sprinkle Pixie Dust
entries: As a bonus action, the pixie sprinkles pixie dust onto one of its arrows. If the pixie hits a creature with that arrow before the start of the pixie's next turn, the deals no damage. Instead, the target must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the arrow causes one of the following effects, based on the target's saving throw result:

items.name: Charm (11–13)
entries: The creature is {@condition charmed} by another creature of the pixie's choice.

items.name: Memory Loss (7–10)
entries: The target makes a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, losing the last 5 minutes of its memory on a failed save.

items.name: Sleep (2–6)
entries: The pixie rolls {@dice 9d8}. If the target has less hit points than the pixie's result, it falls {@condition unconscious}.

items.name: Subdual (1)
entries: The target makes a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
If the pixie's ranged attack scores a critical hit, treat the results of the target's original saving throw as one tier lower.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pixie makes two attacks.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Favored Enemy:
entries: Beasts. The poacher gains advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks to search for their favored enemies and on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track them.

trait.name: Precision Edge
entries: The first time the poacher hits a beast in a round, they deal an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The poacher makes two attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Prazil has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of his allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Prazil has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, Prazil deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the kobold that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Prazil doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Prazil makes two melee attacks.

action.name: +1 Silver Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@dice 1d10 + 2}) if used with two hands.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Smash Kneecaps
entries: Prazil makes a warhammer attack with a +2 bonus against a creature that is Medium or larger and that has legs. He deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage on a hit, and the target must succeed at a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have its speed reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The quelaunt's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 13} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magical Weapons
entries: The quelaunt's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Psychic Feeder
entries: When the quelaunt deals psychic damage to a creature, it gains 5 temporary hit points. The quelaunt can have as many as 40 total temporary hit points gained in this way. As an action, the quelaunt can remove any number of these temporary hit points to recover a number of hit points equal to the temporary hit points removed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quelaunt makes three melee attacks, or it casts two innate spells.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Wracking Spiral {@recharge 5}
entries: The quelaunt emits a burst of emotion-altering energy in a 60-foot radius. Creatures in the area that aren't aberrations must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. Creatures that fail take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage and gain one condition (described below) on a failed save. Those that succeed take half as much damage and don't gain a condition. Wracking Spiral can cause a creature to gain the following conditions:

items.name: Adoration
entries: The creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the quelaunt for 1 minute.

items.name: Despair
entries: The creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the quelaunt, and is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute.

items.name: Delusion
entries: The creature gains a {@table short-term madness|DMG} for 1 minute and is convinced that they are much stronger than they really are. The affected creature takes dangerous and foolish risks.
Affected creatures can make another saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the condition on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Quintessa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following bard spells known:

trait.name: Low Profile
entries: The first time in a round anyone would attack Quintessa or target her with a spell or ability that allows a saving throw, they must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence or Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they must choose a different target or take a different action not targeting Quintessa.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60, one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

immune.note: from non-magical attacks that aren't adamantine

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warden's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

trait.name: Gatekeeper Aura
entries: A creature that uses a teleportation ability within 30 feet of the warden or enters a space within 30 feet of the warden must succeed a {@dc 18} Charisma save or have its destination changed to a point of the radiant warden's choosing within 30 feet of the warden. Whether or not the save is successful, the creature gets disadvantage on all attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The warden's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Orrery
entries: Until it acts, the radiant warden appears to be a large mechanical orrery. A successful {@dc 21} {@skill Perception} check is required to detect it as anything other than an orrery.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warden makes two attacks.

action.name: Radiant Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Beam
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d10}) radiant damage.

action.name: Forced Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The warden targets up to five creatures that it can see within 30 feet of itself. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma save or be teleported to an unoccupied space that the warden can see within 60 feet of the warden.

action.name: Radiant Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The radiant warden generates a 50-foot cone of bright energy. Every creature in the cone must attempt a {@dc 18} Dexterity save, taking 65 ({@damage 10d12}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Divine Revulsion
entries: If a creature brandishes a holy symbol of any deity at the redcap (requiring an action by the brandishing creature each turn), the redcap becomes {@condition frightened}. The redcap can make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns to overcome this effect. If it succeeds, it cannot be {@condition frightened} again in this way for 1 hour.

trait.name: Deadly Cleave
entries: Whenever the redcap reduces an opponent to 0 hit points with a melee weapon attack, it can immediately make another melee weapon attack of the same kind against a different creature.

trait.name: Red Cap
entries: A redcap's hat is dyed with the blood of its victims. As long as the hat is worn, the redcap heals 5 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If its cap is removed, it loses this benefit, as well as its damage resistances, until the hat is restored. An adjacent creature can attempt to snatch a redcap's hat as an action by succeeding on a {@dc 20} Dexterity check. A redcap can make a replacement cap in 10 minutes, but the new cap does not grant these benefits until the redcap has used its blood soak ability on it at least once. A redcap's cap grants no benefits to anyone other than the redcap that made it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The redcap makes two scythe attacks and a stomp attack.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blood Soak
entries: The redcap dips its cap in the blood of a slain foe. The foe must have died within the last minute, and the redcap must have dealt at least 1 point of damage to it. For the next minute, all of the redcap's melee attacks deal an additional 5 damage.

action.name: Momentous Stomp
entries: The redcap makes a single stomp attack, dealing an additional 1 point of damage for every 5 feet it moved so far during its turn.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches Rezatha or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}41({@dice 6d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Rezatha can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: Rezatha makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is {@action grapple|PHB|grappling}. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the {@action grapple} ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Rezatha, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns. If Rezatha takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Rezatha must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the remorhaz. If Rezatha dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rigg's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). Rigg can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: When not moving, Rigg is {@condition invisible}. After an attack, Rigg remains visible until the start of his next turn. Any equipment Rigg wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with him.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rigg has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Rigg deals an extra 17 ({@damage 5d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Rigg that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Rigg doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Supernatural Speed
entries: Rigg's enemies have disadvantage on attacks against him when he moves.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rigg makes three shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The risen fetch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). The fetch can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1: {@spell plane shift} (to or from the First World only)

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The fetch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The fetch regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If the stalker takes fire or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the risen fetch's next turn. The fetch dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Shadow of Death
entries: When the fetch scores a critical hit on a foe with its fetch weapon, it can use a bonus action to cast {@spell phantasmal killer} against that target with its innate spellcasting.

trait.name: Tongues
entries: The fetch can understand all spoken languages and can be understood by any creature that has a language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The risen fetch makes four weapon attacks.

action.name: Summoned Fetch Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage. When the risen fetch manifests this weapon, it can choose its appearance, and can alter the damage type from slashing to bludgeoning or piercing.

trait.name: Long Neck
entries: An elasmosaurus's long neck allows it to interact with the surface while its body remains submerged underwater. While submerged no deeper than 15 feet underwater, an elasmosaurus can still stick its head up to breathe. An elasmosaurus gains three-quarters cover against attacks made against creatures who are above the water's surface while it is underwater, even if its head is above the surface.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Elasmosaurus makes one jaws and two paddle attacks per round.

action.name: Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) piercing damage. On a hit, the elasmosaurus attempts to drag its opponent below the water's surface. The opponent must make a Strength or Dexterity saving throw contested by the elasmosaurus's Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. If the elasmosaurus succeeds, the foe is {@condition grappled} and pulled 5 feet toward the elasmosaurus's body. If the target fails by 5 or more, it is moved 10 feet toward the elasmosaurus. Until this {@action grapple} ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the elasmosaurus can't grab another target.

action.name: Paddle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Thrashing Retreat
entries: A swimming elasmosaurus thrashes the area around it as it attempts to flee. It makes two paddle attacks, each of which must be against separate targets. It then swims up to its swim speed, not provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|attacks of opportunity} when it swims out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Brutal Beating
entries: The ruffian's brutality shakes foes' confidence. Once per turn, the ruffian can deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to one creature they hit with an attack if they have advantage on the attack roll. The target must succeed at a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Whether or not the save is successful, the ruffian can knock the target up to 10 feet away. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Hold and Beat
entries: The ruffian has advantage on attack rolls against creatures it is {@action grapple|PHB|grappling}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ruffian makes two attacks.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't cold iron

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sard's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the sard fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Planar Acclimation
entries: The sard always treats the plane it is currently on as its native plane.

trait.name: Splintering Death
entries: When the sard dies, its body explodes in a blast of lightning and splinters. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) piercing damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Any creature that takes piercing damage is also exposed to sard venom, requiring a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. Creatures that fail this saving throw are {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute and take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage at the start of each of their turns as long as they are {@condition poisoned}. Affected creatures can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the {@condition poisoned} effect on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sard makes two attacks: one with its vine, and one with its trunk, or it makes two thorns attacks.

action.name: Thorns
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 180/360 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage at the start of each of their turns, and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Trunk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Vine
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage at the start of each of their turns, and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

legendary.name: Trunk
entries: The sard attacks with its trunk.

legendary.name: Trample (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sard moves at least 20 feet in a straight line and can move through Huge or smaller creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. The sard makes a trunk attack against all creatures and objects it moves through; any creature hit must succeed at a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If a creature in the sard's path is {@condition prone}, the sard can make a stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Lightning-Struck Curse (Costs 3 actions)
entries: A target creature within 60 feet must succeed a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, the creature either loses its lightning resistance, or gains vulnerability to lightning damage if it does not have lightning resistance. The curse lasts until removed by {@spell remove curse} or other magic.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Satinder is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60, one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dead Tree
entries: While the scythe tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal dead tree.

trait.name: Lunging Slice (1/Round)
entries: As a bonus action, the scythe tree can extend the reach of its next scythe branch attack to 20 feet. This attack scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scythe tree makes three scythe branch attacks.

action.name: Scythe Branch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sepoko is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Sepoko has an icy {@item morningstar|PHB} and two {@item Potion of Superior Healing|DMG|potions of superior healing}.

trait.name: Swamp Stride
entries: Sepoko ignores {@quickref difficult terrain||3} when in swamp terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sepoko makes one morningstar attack and one tongue attack.

action.name: Icy Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d12 + 1}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the boggard can't use its tongue attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The shoggoth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Maddening Cacophony
entries: The shoggoth constantly voices syllables and mutterings that mortals were not meant to hear as long as it's not {@condition incapacitated}. Each creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the shoggoth and can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 3, the creature does nothing. On a 4 or a 5 the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all of its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 6 or a 7 the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack. On an 8, the creature falls {@condition prone} and worships the shoggoth while spouting strange gibbering words of adoration and fear.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shoggoth makes three pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 feet., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the shoggoth can automatically hit the target with its pseudopod.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The shoggoth moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Huge or smaller creature's spaces. Whenever the shoggoth enters a creature's space, the creature must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw.

On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the shoggoth. A creature that chooses not to be pushed becomes subject to the effects of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the shoggoth enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is {@condition restrained}, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the shoggoth's turns. When the shoggoth moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.
An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 19} Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the shoggoth.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Sister of the Bloodshot Eye is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Madness
entries: Any enemy within 30 feet of the Sister of the Bloodshot Eye must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become confused, as per the spell {@spell confusion}. If the creature moves more than 30 feet from the Sister of the Bloodshot Eye, the effect ends immediately.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60, one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeletal champion makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeletal hulk makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The skeletal Tiger Lord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the skeletal Tiger Lord takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the skeletal tiger lord's next turn. The skeletal Tiger Lord only dies if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the skeletal Tiger Lord is destroyed, it regains all of its hit points in one hour unless the runes in {@creature Armag|PKB|Armag's} tomb have been destroyed. If the skeletal Tiger Lord was destroyed by radiant damage, this trait does not function.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeletal Tiger Lord makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600, one target. {@h}7 piercing ({@dice 1d8 + 3}).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The skulltaker's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}). The skulltaker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

trait.name: Skeletal Lore
entries: A skulltaker taps into the memories of the creatures whose bones make up its body. This gives it the ability to speak and understand all of the languages known by the creatures whose bones make up its body (typically including {@language Common} and the regional language of the skulltaker's home region).

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The skulltaker has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skulltaker makes three attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Jaw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bone Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Bonetaker
entries: When a creature dies within 60 feet of the skulltaker, its corpse is pulled into the skulltaker's form. The creature rises as a {@creature skeletal champion|PKB} at the end of the skulltaker's next turn under the skulltaker's control, in a space within 5 feet of the skulltaker.

legendary.name: Cast Spell
entries: The skulltaker casts an at will spell.

legendary.name: Energy Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature within 30 feet of the skulltaker that the skulltaker can see and that isn't undead must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save. The skulltaker recovers half the damage done this way, or, if more than 23 damage is dealt, the skulltaker might recover a spent 2/day spell.

legendary.name: Splintered Ground (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The skulltaker causes splintered bones to erupt from all solid surfaces in a 100-foot radius, excepting surfaces that are worked stone. A creature moving through the bones takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) piercing and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage for every 5 feet of movement. The bones remain in place until the skulltaker uses this action again, or the bones are manually removed, which takes 10 minutes for each 5-foot square.

legendary.name: From the Shard Swarm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The skulltaker forms a {@creature skeletal champion|PKB} from its own swirling form. The {@creature skeletal champion|PKB} appears in a space within 5 feet from the skulltaker and is under the control of the skulltaker.

trait.name: Back Slime
entries: The slurk's back slime grants a creature riding it advantage on {@skill Animal Handling} checks made to stay mounted, but disadvantage on {@skill Animal Handling} checks to dismount.

trait.name: Belly Grease
entries: Creatures have disadvantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to {@action grapple} the slurk, and the slurk has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to escape a {@action grapple}. It never slips on grease or similar slippery terrain. As an action, a slurk can wallow on a solid surface to create a 5-foot space of slime that acts as {@quickref difficult terrain||3} for 1 minute, after which the grease dries to a nasty crust. Once per minute, a mire slurk can spend a full round wallowing and smearing its slime in its own square and all adjacent squares, creating an area of {@quickref difficult terrain||3} that lasts for 10 minutes before drying out.

trait.name: Hunker
entries: The slurk has advantage on saving throws to resist being pushed or knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tusks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Slime Squirt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the creature is {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The snapping flytrap makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Caster Link
entries: A conjured soul eater forms a mental link with its conjurer. While both are on the same plane, the soul eater knows the location of its conjurer. If the soul eater's target dies before the soul eater can drain its soul, or if the soul eater is defeated (but not killed), the soul eater returns to its conjurer and tries to kill them.

trait.name: Find Target
entries: When summoned, the soul eater is given the name of its prey. It knows the direction and distance of the creature, even if the creature and the soul eater are on different planes of existence.

action.name: Numbing Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage and the creature must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Drain Soul
entries: If the soul eater is adjacent to a dying creature, the soul eater can attempt to devour the dying creature's soul. The target must attempt a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw, dying on a failed save. Only a {@spell wish} spell can restore the creature back to life, unless the soul eater is slain within 100 feet of the creature's corpse within 1 minute of death. If this occurs, the creature's soul returns to its body and it is dying with one failed death saving throw.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: Speartooth has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If Speartooth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, Speartooth can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Speartooth makes three melee attacks, one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Consume Life
entries: As a bonus action, the spirit of Stisshak can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the spirit of Stisshak regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Ephemeral
entries: The spirit of Stisshak can't wear or carry anything.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The spirit of Stisshak can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Variable Illumination
entries: The spirit of Stisshak sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius. The spirit of Stisshak can alter the radius as a bonus action.

action.name: Shock
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become {@condition invisible} until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

action.name: Invoke Stisshak
entries: Once per day, the spirit of Stisshak can manifest a shimmering form, that of a regal lizardfolk king made of flickering, ghostly light. This image is Medium and must manifest within 10 feet of the spirit. Once manifested, the spirit can sustain the image by {@status concentration||concentrating}, and can speak through it and effect minor gestures, but can't move the manifestation. The spirit gains advantage on {@skill Intimidation} checks made to demoralize foes through this invoked image. Any damage inflicted to the spirit causes the invoked illusion to vanish immediately.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm can attack every creature in its space with swarming bites.

action.name: Swarming Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

reaction.name: Pour Down Throat:
entries: Whenever a creature in the sportlebore swarm's space speaks, casts a spell with a verbal component, or otherwise opens its mouth, the swarm pours into its mouth unless the creature succeeds on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's speech is interrupted and any command word or spellcasting is ruined (the spell slot is still expended). In addition, on a failed Dexterity saving throw the creature must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage from sportlebore bites on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A creature failing this Constitution saving throw can't speak. They can attempt a new saving throw to end this effect at the end of each of their turns, with advantage on the saving throw on each round after the first.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The spriggan bully's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}). The spriggan can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spriggan bully makes two attacks with its morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Enraged Growth
entries: When it takes damage, the spriggan bully magically increases in size, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the spriggan is Large and it gains the following benefits:

items: +5 feet to the reach of its melee attacks.
It regains 5 hit points.
+2 to its Armor Class and attack rolls.
Doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks.

entries: If the spriggan lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size space possible in the space available. Any creature adjacent to the spriggan must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or is pushed back to allow for the spriggan's growth.
The spriggan bully returns to its normal size at the end of its next round and gains one level of {@condition exhaustion} that lasts for 1 hour.

items.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The spriggan warlord's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). The spriggan warlord can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spriggan warlord makes three attacks with its morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Enraged Growth
entries: When it takes damage, the spriggan warlord magically increases in size, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the spriggan is Large and it gains the following benefits:

items: +5 feet to the reach of its melee attacks.
It regains 15 hit points.
+2 to its Armor Class and attack rolls.
Doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks.

entries: If the spriggan lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size space possible in the space available. Any creature adjacent to the spriggan must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or is pushed back to allow for the spriggan's growth.

The spriggan warlord returns to its normal size at the end of the next round that it does not deal damage to a target, and the spriggan gains one level of {@condition exhaustion} that lasts for 1 hour.

items.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During his first turn, the Stag Lord has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the Stag Lord scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the Stag Lord is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The Stag Lord has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Perpetual Hangover
entries: The Stag Lord is in a constant cycling state of being drunk or hungover. As a result, he has disadvantage on all Dexterity and Wisdom checks.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the Stag Lord deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Stag Lord that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the Stag Lord doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Stag Lord makes two melee or three ranged attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150 ft./600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Volley {@recharge}
entries: The Stag Lord makes one ranged attack against every enemy within 10 feet of a point he can see.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) piercing.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The storm-struck treant's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}). The lightning treant can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the storm-struck treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the lightning treant is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The storm-struck treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The storm-struck treant makes three slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 5d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Cleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The roc makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}. The roc can {@action grapple} up to two creatures at a time.

action.name: Wing Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet.

action.name: Flying Strafe
entries: The roc flies up to 60 feet and makes two talon attacks, each against a separate creature along its path. The roc doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|PHB|attacks of opportunity} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

reaction.name: Wing Rebuff
entries: When a creature moves within 15 feet of the roc, the roc can make a wing strike attack against it.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The tarn linnorm can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Creature of Primal Magic
entries: The tarn linnorm is constantly under the effects of {@spell freedom of movement}.

trait.name: Curse of Death
entries: When a creature slays a tarn linnorm, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. If the save fails, the target can no longer be affected by healing spells and does not heal damage naturally from rest. This curse is treated as the spell {@spell bestow curse} cast from a 9th level slot.

trait.name: Draconic Nature
entries: The tarn linnorm does not age, and magic can't put the linnorm to sleep.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the tarn linnorm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tarn linnorm has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The linnorm regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If the linnorm takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The linnorm dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: When the tarn linnorm uses its breath weapon, it can use its bonus action to have its second head use one of the following effects:

items: The second head makes a bite attack.
The second head uses its breath weapon, creating an adjacent 60-foot cone of acid. If this happens, the linnorm's breath weapon recharges on a 6 for its next use, rather than on a 5–6.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tarn linnorm makes five attacks: two bite attacks (one per head), two claw attacks, and one tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d4 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the tarn linnorm can automatically hit the target with its tail, and he can't make tail attacks against other targets.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The tarn linnorm exhales acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 22d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The tarn linnorm makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The tarn linnorm makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Stoke the Fires (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The tarn linnorm focuses its internal acid gland, allowing it to roll immediately to recharge its breath weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Tartuccio is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Tartuccio has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Change Shape
entries: By performing a 10-minute ritual, Tartuccio can polymorph into a Small humanoid with a unique appearance, or back into his true form. He can't use this ability to disguise himself as a specific individual. His statistics are the same in each form, and he reverts to his true form if he is slain. He uses this ability to take on the appearance of a purple-scaled kobold named Tartuk.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Tartuccio has a {@item wand of magic missiles}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tartuccio makes two attacks with his sickle, or he uses his wand of magic missiles.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
entries: Tartuccio expends a charge to activate his wand of magic missiles, launching three darts of force. Each dart hits a creature of Tartuccio's choice that he can see within range, dealing 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) force damage. The wand has 7 charges, and Tartuccio can expend extra charges, adding one dart per charge spent. The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If the last charge is used, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand turns to ash and is destroyed.

reaction.name: Invoke Old Sharptooth
entries: When a Sootscale kobold harms Tartuccio while he is disguised as Tartuk, he demoralizes the kobold with a short warning such as "Old Sharptooth will punish you for your transgressions!" The kobold gains disadvantage on all checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the tatzlwyrm moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the tatzlwyrm can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tatzlwyrm makes two attacks; one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath
entries: The tatzlwyrm breathes a poisonous cloud into a {@condition grappled} creature's face. The creature must succeed a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The tendriculos regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the tendriculos's next turn. The tendriculos dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tendriculos makes three melee attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tendriculos can't use this tentacle to attack.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The tendriculos makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is {@action grapple|PHB|grappling}. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the {@action grapple} ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tendriculos, and it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the tendriculos's turns. At the start of each of its turns, the swallowed creature must make a successful {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition poisoned}, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}.

If the tendriculos takes 15 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tendriculos must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of its turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tendriculos. If the tendriculos dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Formation Fighter
entries: Terrion has advantage on all attack rolls as long as he is within 5 feet of two or more other allies that aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, Terrion can deal an extra 17 ({@damage 5d6}) damage to a creature he hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of Terrion that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Terrion makes three longbow attacks or three longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands. If the target is a creature and is hit by two or more of Terrion's attacks, it must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of him. A {@condition frightened} creature can attempt a new saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end this condition.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150 ft./600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The Beast has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight and smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Beast makes three melee attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that are not silvered

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The First Faithful is a 14th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Touch of Corruption
entries: The First Faithful's melee attacks are considered magical and deal an additional 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage (included in attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The first faithful makes three attacks with his staff.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Release the Inmost Worms {@recharge 5}
entries: The First Faithful spends an action to expel a bloody worm from the scar on his forehead, targeting a creature within 30 feet that it can see. The creature must succeed at a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or the worm burrows into the creature's head, dealing 42 ({@damage 12d6}) psychic damage and incapacitating the target until the beginning of the First Faithful's next turn. On a successful save, the worm deals half damage and falls to the ground, vanishing, and the target is not {@condition incapacitated}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Gardener is a 16th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The Gardener knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The Gardener can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when he is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The Gardener can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. He takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if he ends his turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Gardener makes two melee attacks with his withering touch.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}33 ({@damage 8d6 + 5}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The Gardener enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. He is visible on the Material Plane while he is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet he can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of The Gardener that can see him must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages {@dice 1d4  10} years. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a {@spell greater restoration} spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of his turns, the Hateful Hermit can use his bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Focus Hatred
entries: At the start of his turn as a bonus action, the Hateful Hermit unleashes a vexing stream of profanities and threats at a single foe he can see within 30 feet. The Hermit gains advantage on the first attack roll he makes against that target on this turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The Hateful Hermit deals an extra 17 ({@damage 5d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Hermit that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the Hermit doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Hateful Hermit makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blowgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Horned Hunter is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). The Horned Hunter has the following ranger spells known:

trait.name: Archery
entries: The Horned Hunter gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls he makes with ranged weapons (included in the attack).

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the Horned Hunter is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the Horned Hunter instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

trait.name: Fey Conduit
entries: Before she sent him into the Material Plane, {@creature Nyrissa|PKB} used the power of her home within the Fable to forge a link with the Horned Hunter. During his time on the Material Plane, she can observe the world as if seeing through his eyes and listening through his ears. She cannot bolster the Horned Hunter via this link, and uses it primarily to spy on the PCs and observe their tactics in preparation for what she hopes never occurs—their invasion of Thousandbreaths. If the Horned Hunter claims Briar, the sword causes this link to {@creature Nyrissa|PKB} to end immediately.

trait.name: Fey Weapons
entries: The Horned Hunter's weapon attacks are magical. When the Horned Hunter hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Horned Hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Horned Hunter makes three attacks.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Panpipes
entries: The Horned Hunter plays pipes and chooses one of the following magical effects: a charming melody, a frightening strain, or a gentle lullaby. Any creature within 60 feet of The Horned Hunter that can hear the pipes must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be affected as described below. Other satyrs and creatures that can't be {@condition charmed} are unaffected.

An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to these panpipes for the next 24 hours.

items.name: Charming Melody
entries: The creature is {@condition charmed} by The Horned Hunter for 1 minute. If The Horned Hunter or any of its companions harms the creature, the effect on it ends immediately.

items.name: Frightening Strain
entries: The creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

items.name: Gentle Lullaby
entries: The creature falls asleep and is {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The effect ends if the creature takes damage or if someone takes an action to shake the creature awake.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Knurly Witch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). The Knurly Witch can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Knurly Witch is a 13th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). The Knurly Witch has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, the Knurly Witch can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Knurly Witch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Knurly Witch makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the Lonely Warrior has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Lonely Warrior makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a {@creature zombie|MM} under the Lonely Warrior's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The Lonely Warrior can have no more than 12 {@creature zombie|MM|zombies} under its control at one time.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The Misbegotten Troll has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the Misbegotten Troll hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Misbegotten Troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Misbegotten Troll regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the Misbegotten Troll's next turn. The Misbegotten Troll dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Misbegotten Troll makes three melee attacks, two with his glaive and one with his bite, or two with his claws and one with his bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Counterattack
entries: When struck by an enemy with a melee weapon, the Misbegotten Troll makes one glaive or claws attack against the creature that hit him.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The Misbegotten Troll makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Glaive Attack
entries: The Misbegotten Troll makes a glaive attack.

legendary.name: Jangle the Chain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Misbegotten Troll shakes his chain of caged sprites, causing the supernatural cages to amplify their despair. All creatures other than the Misbegotten Troll or his smilodon pets within 30 feet must attempt a {@dc 18} Wisdom save or become overwhelmed with sadness, causing them to be {@condition stunned} until the end of their next turn.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Nightmare Rook's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The Nightmare Rook has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Nightmare Rook has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Nightmare Rook's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Nightmare Rook regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the Nightmare Rook takes damage from silvered weapons, this trait doesn't function at the start of the Nightmare Rook's next turn. The Nightmare Rook dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Nightmare Rook can use its Frightful Presence. Then it makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the Nightmare Rook can't use its talons on another target.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the Nightmare Rook's choice that is within 30 feet and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Nightmare Rook's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Wriggling Man is a 17th-level spellcaster.
His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). The Wriggling Man has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Wriggling Man regains 18 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of The Wriggling Man's next turn. If the Wriggling Man starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate, he makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, dying on a failure. On a success, his form collapses into a mass of dead worms, as it does when he dies, but one worm survives. The Wriggling Man reforms from the remaining worm in {@dice 1d10} days, fully healed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Wriggling Man makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150 ft./600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the Thresholder disciple is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the Thresholder disciple instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Ominous Mien
entries: Any hostile creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the Thresholder disciple must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw, becoming {@condition frightened} of the disciple on a failed save. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Outside of Time
entries: The Thresholder disciple exists outside of time; it doesn't age, doesn't need food or drink to survive, and can't be affected by the {@spell haste} or {@spell slow} spells unless it chooses to be.

trait.name: Unseen Sight
entries: The Thresholder has the ability to see the truth of the world, granting them {@sense darkvision} and {@sense truesight} to a distance of 60 feet, as long as they remain in a region under Yog-Sothoth's influence.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Thresholder disciple makes four lurker claw attacks or four shuriken attacks.

action.name: Lurker Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Shuriken
